description:
*** Turn your mobile device into the perfect study companion with FlashCards ***

Learn languages faster. Prep for exams anywhere. Teach your kids anytime. Even entertain yourself with fun trivia. Versatility is it's middle name.

Download from 800+ hand selected Editor's Picks. Direct access to millions of Quizlet.com and Flashcard Exchange sets. Import from StudyStack.com, ProProfs, CSV, and more. You can even record audio for your flash cards! Did I mention versatility?

FlashCards also utilizes webOS’s unique ability to multi-task. Now you can jam to your music while you study!

Flash Cards are perfect for:

+ SAT, LSAT, MCAT, GRE, GMAT, TOEIC
+ Kids: Math, Alphabet, Coins, Sight Words, Shapes, Colors
+ Spanish, German, French, Italian, Portuguese, Japanese, Mandarin, Cantonese, Greek, Morse Code
+ Advaned Placement (AP), Nursing, Psychology, Computers, Arts & Literature, Law, Pilot Training
+ 65+ Fun Facts & Trivia

We have it all. Don’t pay up to $50 for a single set of cards when you can have it all on your phone with FlashCards. Download and smarten up quick, today!

FlashCards is the most advanced application of it’s kind. Find out why it is one of the highest rated app of all time.

Can you find the hidden features?
